Cella.JS

Easily and securely manage data storage within the browser with a simple API.

Getting Started Read the docs

About

Cella.JS is an open source framework built with the aim of making data storage within the browser an easier process for developers. Cella.JS seeks to promote an offline experience for web applications. It's designed to to be compatible with several use cases many developers might safe regarding the browser storage and data storage in general.

Easy Start

Getting started with Cella.JS is not that hard. Infact, it's not hard at all. Cella.JS offers intuitive syntax anyone can understand, but first things first, include the library in your project.

How to install

Precise Documenation

Cella.JS docs are well laid out and each method and typing is explained concisely to make sure anyone can understand it. It's easy, check out the docs.

Read the docs

Less Code, Do More

Cella.JS makes it easy to do more with less code by doing all the extra coding so you don't have to. Cella.JS goes on to provide extra features to make your workflow even easier.

Check out syntax

npm install cella.js
